TEXT.TITLE: MCCARTHY AND STONE GETS 100 MLN STG FACILITY
TEXT.BODY: McCarthy and Stone Plc, a public U.K. Company which owns and operates retirement homes, has signed a 100 mln stg multi-option facility, National Westminster Bank Plc said as arranger. The facility incorporate a 70 mln stg committed element from a group of international banks. The facility will provide the group with working capital to meet its planned expansion in the U.K. Over the next three years. REUTER
